# vtb_kafka_image_data (Data Source)

Image data from reference service needed to create order

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "vtb_kafka_image_data" "test" {
	distribution    = "astra"
	os_version         = "1.7"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `distribution` (String) Name of distribution (RHEL or Astra).

### Optional

- `os_version` (String) Verison of distribution image.

### Read-Only

- `ad_integration` (Boolean) Flag for integration compute instance with Active Directory.
- `default_kafka_version` (String) Verison of kafka distribution image.
- `geo_distribution` (Boolean) Flag for using geo distribution of cluster's nodes
- `on_support` (Boolean) Flag mean, what the product will supported by sup group.
- `product_id` (String) Product id of kafka cluster instance.
